snippet: Yahoo stepped up its feud with Facebook on Monday, suing the social-networking giant and accusing it of infringing on 10 patents tied to an array of Web technologies.
abstract: Yahoo stepped up its feud with Facebook on Monday, suing the social-networking giant and accusing it of infringing on 10 patents tied to an array of Web technologies.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: As It Warned, Yahoo Sues Facebook Over Patents
headline.print_headline: As It Warned, Yahoo Sues Facebook Over Patents
